website_summaries.verdict: Manufacturer in business since 1906. Family-owned company brings flaxseeds from farm to table.
pros: Farmed naturally, with no pesticides used during production
Mild nutty flavor makes them great as an ice cream topping
Come in big container for easy storage
True cold-milled process extends shelf life of product for 24 months
Won't lose taste or consistency due to the way they are processed
cons: Needs to be ground with grinder
Tastes like plastic in some cases

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Good price. I use the flax seeds to make heat pillows. Just cut off an old pajama pant leg, securely tie off one end, pour in entire jar of seeds, tie open end, and microwave for 5-6 minutes. Warms chilled feet, eases back pain, and conforms nicely to your body. Better than sleeping with a stuffed animal!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Put This Flax In a Coffee Grinder.  It Should Be A Powder For Maximum Nutrition
customer_reviews.text: This flax has the highest 5 star rating I've ever seen on Amazon for a health product. Don't be put off by the omega-6 content. It has twice as much omega-3, which is very good ratio. Some omega-3 is processed into DHA which is used to keep the brain working into your senior years. Omega-6 fuels the coagulation process, which is dangerous in excess, but necessary to keep you from bleeding to death from a cut. Research also shows flax lowers the risk of breast & prostate cancer. It stays fresh as a seed for months, but quickly goes rancid as a powder. If you're on a budget, flax is an inexpensive health food.
customer_reviews.author: J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I guess it is my own fault for not properly ...
customer_reviews.text: I guess it is my own fault for not properly reading the description but I was shocked at the size of this container when it arrived. I thought I was getting one of those bulk spice size containers. WRONG! Lifetime supply right here! 6 pounds of flax seeds! At least I can guarantee my BMs will be regular ;)
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement for diabetics.
customer_reviews.text: I bought flax seeds as a supplement for smoothies. It works great to add fiber and protein with fewer carbs. They also contain other important nutrients to assist in breaking down your food so your body can use all those good things you put into it. You will need to soak the seeds to get the most out of the nutrients. I soak one tablespoon of seeds in a cup of filtered water overnight in the refrigerator and then add the seeds, water and all to my smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Creager

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting, huge supply of flaxseed that is in an easy to open, wide mouth container
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this massive container of flaxseed along with a separate grinder in order to start eating flaxseed (1 oz) every day, which gives me a bit over 3 months worth of flaxseed. The container is easy to open, large enough for the opening to put a scooper inside the container to put the flaxseed into my grinder. Overall, I'm very happy with this purchase. The flaxseed are delicious and I have a huge supply before this re-orders. I'm also incredibly pleased that subscribe and save was available with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Miraenda

customer_reviews.title: Seeds are viable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on a whim while looking for flax seeds to grow for a summer project to harvest linen. Other options for flax seeds intended to be planted were either expensive, like 500 seeds for $10-$15, or were mixed in with other wild flowers. I did a germination test with a pinch of these seeds by putting them in a wet napkin and sandwich bag. I had intended to give it up to three weeks, but after two days I had an 84% germination rate. I expect it will get higher, but considering there are probably a million seeds in the 96oz. I am more than satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: SB Jones

customer_reviews.title: I have no complaints
customer_reviews.text: First time buying whole flaxseeds. I bought it to make a DIY flaxseed gel..turned out great. I only used 1/4C and 2C water and it made 4 cups of gel lol I'll use less next time.
customer_reviews.author: Danyelle House

customer_reviews.title: Really helps clean your system
customer_reviews.text: This container arrived and is larger than I expected. There is a lot of flax seed for the whole family. For the price, this is a great value. Since my husband is doing keto, I mixed this with Parmesan cheese and baked it in the oven. After about 5-10 minutes, depending on the size, I have cheese crisps for him to snack on. Let me say...this mixed with Parmesan really helped clean out his system. Kept seeing him go to the bathroom throughout the day for the whole week, but not in a I’m-about-to-crap-my-pants way. Now I need to find more recipes to incorporate this into other foods.
customer_reviews.author: DeeLio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flax seeds
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this brand for a couple of months now and it's still one of the best when it comes to gold flaxseed. The product is indeed premium and grinding gives a smooth result for baking. The flavor is excellent and the container closes airtight. Besides that you need an airtight container for storing the flaxseed, the empty container is very useful for other purposes. I've seen these containers being sold around $3.50, so the price of this flaxseed is very reasonable. I can highly recommend this flaxseed for baking, adding to the muesli, etc.
customer_reviews.author: patrick_pdx

customer_reviews.title: Taste is so off-its either rotten or contaminated.
customer_reviews.text: I love flax seeds. The taste is usually enjoyable-until I got these. I just ground some and put on my yogurt... I almost lost my cookies. It wasn't just bad it tastes rotten. I don't know why-perhaps it's not new or worse yet is contaminated! All I know is I bought 2 containers and was so excited to use and now I need to buy more and am completely out now. This is something I feel needs to be in my daily diet and now I am beyond disappointed. YUCK! REALKY YUCK! Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's fresh and tastes good
customer_reviews.text: I've bought golden flaxseed at the grocery store, and I thought maybe I just didn't like it because, to me, it tasted like stale fish, which confused me because I like regular flaxseed. I read that the stale flavor is indeed a sign that the product is not fresh, and since I needed it to make some keto buns etc., I decided to try Premium Gold flaxseed because of it's fresh, and you can get the whole seed vs. ground which can go stale quicker. I love it. It works in my recipes and tastes great. I store the container in the freezer to help preserve it.
customer_reviews.author: RLW

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with a strange, chemical smell. I won’t be eating it. I’ll shop for fresh organic flax from my local food coop, even if I have to pay a bit more for quality and freshness.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Flax
customer_reviews.text: Flax for the next 10 years UPDATE 7/15/2020: Check for splinters... I grind my flax, but prior I spread a Table spoon on a small plate or napkin to inspect....
customer_reviews.author: RoYaLTY_RuLES

customer_reviews.title: This works good for what we wanted it for!
customer_reviews.text: I grind 2 tablespoons each morning for my husband - it really does help with 'over active bladder.' I had read this solution on several web sites and we decided to give it a try. I mix this with his breakfast juice as it works best on an empty stomach from what I researched. This is a convenient container and a large size so I don't have to reorder very often.
customer_reviews.author: Claudi0

customer_reviews.title: Wow.... that's a lot of flax seed!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, that's a lot of flax seed! Great for people who use it daily. I personally like to grind it to get the nutrients AND use it whole just because I enjoy the crunch and texture it gives my oatmeal. This was such a great buy. I'm glad I found it. I've been enjoying it every morning since it arrived, and when I finally do use it up (which will take some time), I plan on coming back for more. Great purchase! .
customer_reviews.author: Ima Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: I like it!!
customer_reviews.text: Never even heard of flax seed til I started trying to eat better. I have always had tummy issues and I hope this helps! I was really worried if I would like this! Wheew... I do!! I like putting this on different foods and in salad! So now I get 1oz daily! :) I got the large container for the best bang for my buck... it's fresh and has a long shelf life :)
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION! many sharp splinters
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you are very careful consuming this product. There are many of these sharp barbs in the container. I'm not sure if I got a bad batch, but the return window had already passed for me unfortunately; otherwise I'd definitely send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for while flax seeds! As another reviewer mentioned, you don't want to buy pre-ground flax seeds because they go rancid too quickly. Make sure you read the details for this product, because you are buying a HUGE amount! But it does have a really long shelf life. We put flax seeds in our smoothies every morning, so we love this big container.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Sagum

customer_reviews.title: Great but not for Omega 3 intake
customer_reviews.text: Good product, however if you’re attempting to use this to replace Omega 3s in your diet, this will not suffice. Granted Flax Seed has other benefits, however our bodies absorb less than 5% of Omega 3’s That are actually contained in Flax. You would have to eat a ton of this to meet your recommended daily value but coincidentally that amount isn’t ideal for cholesterol. FISH OIL ISNT THE ANSWER! Most of it is rancid (if it makes you burp a gross taste it’s already gone bad) so stick to fish for the Omega 3 intake. Other than that, great quality flax seed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional value, essential nutrition and a mild, pleasant taste
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional value ($13) for a huge container of pure flaxseeds. My only criticism is that I wish they’re not organic. If you’re unfamiliar with the benefits of flaxseed, Google it. They are extremely healthy, providing large amounts of omega-3 fatty acids. Use a tablespoon of these seeds in a smoothie, over a salad, or even on a plate of spaghetti. They add a very subtle, nice crunch, and provide essential nutrition and a mild, pleasant taste.
customer_reviews.author: Stu Howard

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: We have bought these flax seeds a few times now. I keep it in the freezer. I primarily grind it in my Vitamix dry container. I have also used it whole in foods. It is a great product, that is fresh, no rancidity!! I will keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: RedSpice

customer_reviews.title: Fresh seeds to grind for crackers/flax eggs
customer_reviews.text: I have used whole flax seed for a few decades, in smoothies, for flax eggs and for flax crackers. The quality of the product is very good. (Rancid seeds have a very distinct chemical smell, which is the reason to always purchase whole, raw flax seeds, and grind them fresh). The price point is very good as well. Will definitely purchase again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid girl

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and smell
customer_reviews.text: Delivered very fast. After I tried couple of seeds to see how they taste my body told me eat more. I ate 4 table spoons! 😳 Probably there is some micro element in them that my body lacks. Smells and tastes great. Jar is sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Mila

customer_reviews.title: They STINK
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used flax seed in the past but this one has a terrible odor. So turned off just gonna throw it out. No one in my family wants it because of the strong repulsive odor
customer_reviews.author: angelica dematas

customer_reviews.title: This makes a great porridge...
customer_reviews.text: Grind in magic bullet, add 2 packets organic stevia from wallymart then pour in heavy cream and eat it. No cooking required, great for keto people in need of some fiber.
customer_reviews.author: Reid

customer_reviews.title: lid not strong
customer_reviews.text: The lid is flimsy and it was delivered broken. I didnt realize since I didnt use it right away. writing this review for the future buyers to keep in mind
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: perfecto!
customer_reviews.text: These flax seeds are a great buy. Where I live you can only buy the already ground seeds and as we know once a seed is ground it loses its oils and becomes rancid. Whole flax is the only way to go. Grind em as you use them.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Heuer

customer_reviews.title: They look clean and grind nicely, can only hope they are truly "Premium Gold ...
customer_reviews.text: They look clean and grind nicely, can only hope they are truly "Premium Gold Flaxseed" with all the benefits one would expect from gold flaxseed. Incredible price for such a large quantity, almost too good to be true. The container is large and sturdy enough to last and to reuse to store other items in later. At this point I highly recommend this product, won't have to purchase more for months to come.
customer_reviews.author: HoppyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the health.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, the trick with flax seeds is they need to be grinded into powder to unlish the nutrients inside the seeds otherwise its a waste of time and money buying them and adding them to your daily diet.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Angel

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the money
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason you want to buy flaxseeds, this is the best deal. I compared it with other shops in- store and online, it is the best. You get 6 pounds in the package. It is sealed tight and fresh. I personally bought it to increase my milk supply. So I use it whole and ground in anything ( oatmeal, cakes, granola, lactation cookies) along with oats and brewer’s and almond, as these are the best food for lactation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian N

customer_reviews.title: This product will change your life,,
customer_reviews.text: This flaxseed is premium quality and the taste is delicious. Started adding the ground flaxseed into my diet and the results have been amazing!! I was having a number of inflammation problems and walking had become excruciating. After about a month of adding 2 tablespoons each morning I am a new person. I have absolutely no pain. I am not a doctor nor do I guarantee these results to anyone else but I will continue this regime for the rest of my life. This product has changed my life!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Very, very good flax seeds
customer_reviews.text: These are great flax seeds. I rated them at 4 stars instead of 5 because they aren't quite as clean as the ones that I used to get in the bulk food section. That said, they are almost perfect, and I am very glad to have them available.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Slattery

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Who thought nutrition could be this good? First time buying flax seed - didn't know what to expect. This is a big container. I sprinkle these seeds on salads and steamed vegetables and they give a nice crunch. No discernible taste that I'm aware of.
customer_reviews.author: Allen EH

customer_reviews.title: A LOT OF FLAXSEEDS!  GREAT VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: This container is HUGE. I’ll have flaxseeds for quite some time. It was well packaged & delivered promptly w/Prime. I immediately tried some on a spoonful of peanut butter, and then I ate a spoonful of just the flaxseeds. They have a great flavor. This big container is a fantastic value if you’ve ever shopped for flaxseeds elsewhere. I’ve been spending way too much for them at Trader Joe’s. I specifically wanted them whole as opposed to ground. I’m very happy I made THIS selection. I think you will be, too!
customer_reviews.author: LBoogie

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product !
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea he contained would be so enormous and full to the top with product, definitely worth your money’s worth! I also tried it with my morning smoothie and have immediately been relieved of my regular bowel movement 3x a day. My overall consitpation has improved tremendously. This is my new go to product!
customer_reviews.author: Flower

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! Others noticing thicker hair
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Others noticing thicker hair, although purchased regularly for 2 years now for general health due to its fiber and omega 3s. Blend it into smoothies!
customer_reviews.author: ACO3

customer_reviews.title: Big Bag of Flaxseed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to make flaxseed gel for my hair. This is a large amount. The homemade gel worked like a charm with no chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lavender eye pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is what I was looking for to make lavender eye pillows. The price was great, the “feel” of them in the pillow was nice, and the lavender essential oil was absorbed very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: gotsol

customer_reviews.title: Fresh enough; taste is fine
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is whether I can use such a large quantity before it starts looking stale. I'm sprinkling it into a lot of dishes; just a little and it's bland enough that it's hardly noticeable. The texture is seems softer than the flax I got at the food coop. I'm not sure what than portends, but it makes it easier to add to miscellaneous dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Pat in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good value, nice container
customer_reviews.text: We use these whole in our smoothie (blender grinds them up with the other stuff) and I grind them myself for use on cereal, etc. Actually, I was able to buy Bob Mill's brand ground flax at the grocery store for less $$ so I may go back to that for the ground version and continue to use these when whole flax seeds are needed.
customer_reviews.author: Betty A. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Flaxseed?
customer_reviews.text: I love Flaxseed but this tastes like plastic. It does not have the rich nutty roasted taste that I have been accustomed to with other brands. Hopefully this makes good bird food.
customer_reviews.author: MN Boulevard

customer_reviews.title: If there's a mess in your mailbox, don't bother opening it!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this product, all but a little flaxseed was in the box,and in the parcel pick up bin! Even with less than satisfactory delivery, I don't see how the sealed lid could have come off.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product at a great price and quick and free shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice color and clean flax seed. Taste is a subtle nutty flavor. Whole seeds I easily grind as needed with a cheap coffee grinder. Very pleased with whole transaction and of course the price is great. Will do business again.
customer_reviews.author: superdave

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I buy this item regularly. Price is fair, convenient bulk size, no weird debris floating around. I do not actually consume the flax seed, but i'm sure it tastes as fresh as it looks!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered very fast. I purchased this to make homemade flax seed gel for my hair which came out perfect. It’s a decent size container that will last for awhile
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Flax seed at a Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: Great Flax seed at a Great Price if you can use this quantity. Flavor is good and it stays fresh longer because it is whole flax seed. I just put it in the coffee grinder for a few seconds to make enough for a week. The rest goes back in the freezer. Very satisfied with this (2nd) purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I have been grinding this for gluten free bread and it is DELICIOUS. It arrived in perfect order and is almost empty now, so will be ordering more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Great American-Grown Flax Seed!!
customer_reviews.text: Huge container of flax seed grown in America by patriots (do your research). These are whole seeds so they'll be fresh when you grind them yourself (you can use a little, inexpensive coffee grinder). Nice and golden and we are enjoying them in oatmeal, meat, sauces, smoothies and love them.
customer_reviews.author: JKayPm

customer_reviews.title: seeds
customer_reviews.text: they are a little hard for me to eat so I use a coffee grinder to break them up ps I put some on a wet paper towel and almost every seed sprouted
customer_reviews.author: rbo350

customer_reviews.title: lid seal was open
customer_reviews.text: This item was sent with a black plastic strip over the lid. When I took off the strip and opened the lid the seal under the lid was open. Not thinking I ground some of the flax seed in the blender. My wife will not use the product since we don't know if the lid seal was opened on purpose or if the flax seed was tampered with. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Fresh, Flax!
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent quality whole flax seeds. I like grinding my own for freshness sake, and I think this is an incredible way to purchase it. Nice large container that allows me to use as much as I wish, without having to worry about running out any time soon! Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: toolsrule

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sesame
customer_reviews.text: A healthy way to get my Omega threes and add other nutrients I will always continue to buy this friend it's a large bulk size and a handy jar which makes it my favorite
customer_reviews.author: Richard Z. Mazurek

customer_reviews.title: OH MY GOSH, a gallon of flaxseed!
customer_reviews.text: My first foray into eating flax and this HUGE container arrived!! It's good, tastes fresh, and I HAVE to eat it because ... huge container on my counter. A nice surprise, and considering the size, a very nice price!
customer_reviews.author: samloomis

customer_reviews.title: 79 years old, look like a spring chicken.
customer_reviews.text: Had the same brand for many years. Doctors are amazed about my longevity, would't tell them.the reason, will only share my secret with Prime Members.. Yes THIS FLAXSEED IS THE BEST. ,
customer_reviews.author: Jaap

customer_reviews.title: Ours very quickly turned rancid. Or was it rancid ...
customer_reviews.text: Ours very quickly turned rancid. Or was it rancid when it arrived? We don't really know. It went directly into the fridge but perhaps it was already too late? We tried using it anyway for a while but really had a hard time and so fed the birds. If you do get one, smell it immediately for the sake of returns and store in the freezer (not just fridge) if you won't be using very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: BRC

customer_reviews.title: These flax seeds were good quality and lasted a long time in the freezer
customer_reviews.text: These flax seeds were good quality and lasted a long time in the freezer. The 96oz bottle is huge!! However, the seeds had an expiration date several years away, so there is plenty of time to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Good product... a huge amount
customer_reviews.text: Huge amount of flax seed but was the cheapest on Amazon that wasn’t like 5 containers. The flax ground up nicely for use and has a decent taste.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: It arrived very fast. It is a big container. It will last for a long time. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Luminita

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great source of Omega-3, I dissolve it in water for a couple of hours before use. Works great! Add it to oatmeal or juices. Excellent value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Slava

customer_reviews.title: Great to grind and add to food for healthy digestion
customer_reviews.text: I try to cook low carb / high fiber and I’ve been adding flaxseed in my cooking and baking for years. Ever since every Dr and nutritionist I ask always say it’s beneficial to our digestion (and contains a lot of fiber and Omega3,6&9+), I add it to everything. Flaxseed meal (& flour) is more expensive than the seed itself. Since I have an old coffee grinder I no longer use for coffee makes a great tool to convert flax seeds into flour.... and Its odorless and tasteless yet adds so much to food!
customer_reviews.author: Larry L. Fillian Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, grind in a old burr coffee grinder I wasn’t using. Best value for money and healthy to boot!
customer_reviews.author: sapidus

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Well hot damn!! I was not expecting this huge Texas size container. Best purchase ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Mz. Burleson

customer_reviews.title: Grind it yourself
customer_reviews.text: Buying the flax this way makes it stay fresher longer. We just use our bullet blender to grind it up. The blender does a better job of grinding than buying it pre-ground.
customer_reviews.author: Prosehill

customer_reviews.title: HEALTH BENEFITS
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love purchasing flax seeds due it's many health benefits! .....just Google the health benefits of flax seeds and you will be amazed! We sprinkle them on salads and fruit bowls along with chia seeds! LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.author: D. B. MILLER

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It's a really really great deal for the price. I store them in a dark cool place so they've stayed fresh for a really really long time. Flavor is nice as well. I've recommended this product to family. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Moj

customer_reviews.title: Flaxseed bargain.
customer_reviews.text: Its a lot if flaxseed! first container had been unsealed and seed spilled. . when box opened seeds had escaped lid and all ovet in odd nooks and crannies of packing material. NO problem getting replacement FAST.
customer_reviews.author: A Kern

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I take this every day with water for my hormonal acne and WOW its amazing. I love the container it comes in because easy to store yet practical for everyday use. Purchasing this you really get a ton for such a great price. It seems very fresh and amazing quality product. I recommend this its a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Not great flavor
customer_reviews.text: The quantity of the flaxseed is good but the flavor is not at par with other products I have used.
customer_reviews.author: SFDC team

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seeds
customer_reviews.text: Very nice golden flax seeds. Huge container! about a foot tall. Lots of seeds!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Orlick

customer_reviews.title: The chickens loved it
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I got these to add some protein to my neighbor's chickens feed. They produced some interestingly​ large eggs. The chickens loved eating these.
customer_reviews.author: thickwaistedman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered it I didn’t realized the size so I was like holly flaxseed galore! Great price, fast shipping and great for the diet!
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this flax! I use it everyday and am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: D Allen

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my health / taste okay, appear to last a long time on counter etc...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my health I think they are working, but do not have difinite proof. I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: I buy these on subscribe and save. They have a long expiration date. Fresh, good quality, storage container keeps them for awhile. I grind them as I need them in smoothies and such. Every week I grind enough for the week and keep it in a mason jar. Check out nutritionfacts.org for more information on why we should eat more flax seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Rissarance

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these flax seeds to include more polyunsaturated fats in my diet. I'm always a little cautious about buying food on the internet, but these have been great. They are fresh, have good flavor, and I think a great value.
customer_reviews.author: purplerhino

customer_reviews.title: Fresh & Delicious
customer_reviews.text: The seeds were delivered very fast. They were very fresh, and had a nice soft taste. Very happy with the big pour plastic bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie P

customer_reviews.title: very good flax seeds.
customer_reviews.text: I grind these flax seeds for use in cooked whole oats as a fiber & omega 3 source. Fresh ground flax seeds also as ingredient in "scratch made" cornmeal muffins. Very good pricepoint for this 96 oz size.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Get alot for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: I will order from this company again. I still have my flex seeds and I keep them in the freezer. I use them for my hair gel. Once I run out I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: All Natural Lady

customer_reviews.title: Had issues with the safety seal being broken on first batch but Amazon did a good job sending a new one
customer_reviews.text: A years supply. Had issues with the safety seal being broken on first batch but Amazon did a good job sending a new one. Large quantity. Get those omega 3 in. May be good for people with hiperlipidema talk to your pmd
customer_reviews.author: Ren R.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good product
customer_reviews.text: Good value, I use it a lot so that was important
customer_reviews.author: Kitty F

customer_reviews.title: Best Flax Seed Deal
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best deal I have ever come around when it comes to getting a good quality whole flaxseed product without it tasting stale or costing a ridiculous amount. This is very reasonably priced, and offers a nice, almost moist (oils) product after its grounded up. I grind it fresh in my coffee grinder, and put it in my smoothies/yogurt/breads/muffins/etc. I even put a tablespoon a day mixed in with my dogs dry food with a little bit of olive oil to moisten it, and they scarf it up! It has made their coats so shiny too.
customer_reviews.author: C. Guevara

customer_reviews.title: HUGE
customer_reviews.text: I'm a health nut and seem to go through Flax pretty quick, so I decided to buy in bulk. This one is HUGE. Will last me months. The actual Flax seems good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Coly11

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: No complaints here. I got them for my hair but enjoy randomly taking a table spoon of seeds to chew on because I like the texture, and the seeds are fresh. Versitile seeds and excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this and loved, but switched to the ground but it became ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this and loved, but switched to the ground but it became mildews quickly! Ended up throwing it out. Went back to whole flaxseed and LOVE it for our smoothies. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: A Crotwell

customer_reviews.title: It’s big, nice container, good taste.
customer_reviews.text: Bigger container than I expected 😚. I thought it was going to be much smaller size. Tastes good, will last a while. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Tenzin

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a small bottle for the price. However it was huge. Enough for my smoothie for the next two months. I also made my over night oats using them.
customer_reviews.author: AD Cammeron

customer_reviews.title: A GIGANTIC bucket
customer_reviews.text: I refer to this as my bucket of flaxseeds, because the container is HUGE! I found the price to be great for the amount of seeds, and they seem fresh and high quality, although I'm not necessarily a flax seed expert.
customer_reviews.author: Becker

customer_reviews.title: You get a huge amt for your money.
customer_reviews.text: It was the largest jar of flax seed I ever saw. You really get your money's worth. I put it in my coffee grinder to grind it. Haven't used it enough to tell if I feel more healthy.
customer_reviews.author: deborah bischoff

customer_reviews.title: GR8 Value! GR8 product! Thx so much! ZERO complaints! You rock!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value and product! Can't beat it! No complaints allowed for the price and freshness... Grind it up... ZERO NITPICKING ALLOWED! #THXBIGTIME #LIFTorLose
customer_reviews.author: MR_COBRA

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality in a convenient container. Not too large, and square, easier to fit in a cupboard or shelf. I use these in baking both whole and ground (ground as needed).
customer_reviews.author: BlueKarma

customer_reviews.title: Super for our horses
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time we have purchased this jar, and we are glad we found it, as we were first buying small bags of flax from a healthfood store, then the individual tubs of flax from this same manufacturer but we felt bad about wasting so much plastic, so we switched to these larger jars. Now, we can use empty jars to store grains and supplements that come in crappy containers or bags. I know that my horses are getting quality flax and we can sprinkle it in our baking too. I buy this every 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Shannyn

customer_reviews.title: Flax ftw
customer_reviews.text: Beneficial calories to take in the morning... a serving don’t take up too much room in your stomach but is full of great nutrients!
customer_reviews.author: Daslickest

customer_reviews.title: super fresh and crunchy
customer_reviews.text: I go through a ton of flax seeds, and this container will last me at least 6 months. I like that its a screw top, so it says fresh longer than bags. They are super fresh, and are a very nice golden brown color. I use them for baking bread, and in my morning smoothies. I grind them in my nutri bullet once a week, and they last all week in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Sammymo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great taste, really great value
customer_reviews.text: Really great seeds. I grind up some with cinnamon and a little sugar, time seeds also and put it on two bananas and add milk. Really filling. Also the same mixture without the sugar and put it on vanilla ice cream. Nutty flavor that is mild and who knows what health benefits. I also add it to rice or stews.
customer_reviews.author: John LaRocque

customer_reviews.title: Best whole seed
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my dr to grind for smoothies just before using to get optimal potency. Blends well. Has helped with fiber as well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great Value! Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I shop for value and find this to be first choice on Amazon for Flax seed. I add this to my smoothies daily.
customer_reviews.author: trigger

customer_reviews.title: Flax Seed
customer_reviews.text: A really large bottle of flax seeds of a great quality that will last a really long time. Nice and nutty.
customer_reviews.author: junepe772

customer_reviews.title: Very fresh good quality product
customer_reviews.text: This product was very satisfactory. I fresh ground them as I needed and the flavor was tasty and great.
customer_reviews.author: Babin

customer_reviews.title: Golden Whole Flax Seed is a Super Food
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to put into a grinder and render into edible powder. It helps with our digestive tract and I love having it in our diets.
customer_reviews.author: Ahnhai

customer_reviews.title: Omega 3 vits and fiber power
customer_reviews.text: My hometown in North Dakota grows this. Good taste and blends well, coffee grinder then shake. Helps grease the tracks for the ol poo poo train.
customer_reviews.author: Pontiac

product_meta.title: Premium Gold Whole Flax Seed | High Fiber Food | Omega 3 | 96oz
product_meta.description: Size:6 Pound (Pack of 1)Golden Flax seed has the natural properties of fiber, lignans and omega-3 fatty acids that provide preventative and restorative abilities to your diet.
feature_bullets: 100% Natural, Gluten and Allergen Free, Kosher, no preservatives, no additives, not genetically engineered
8g of fiber, 6388mg Omega-3, and 360mg of lignans per serving
Farm to Table, Product of the USA
Recommended use: Take 1 to 2 tablespoons 2x daily
